message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $130 for it. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth quite a bit to me. Could you meet me halfway at $115?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $110 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at that price. Can we finalize the deal at $110?
